be.ac.ulb.crashcoin.common.utils

Class Cryptography

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.crashcoin.common.utils.Cryptography

  • public class Cryptography
extends Object
    Utility class containing the cryptographic methods needed in the common package.

      Convert encoded private and public keys (bytes) to Private / PublicKey interfaces and generate a KeyPair from them in order to construct a Wallet object in the signIn method
      Two different encoding

      • hashBytes

        public static byte[] hashBytes(byte[] data)
        Performs SHA-256 hash of the transaction
        Parameters:
        data - the byte array to hash
        Returns:
        A 32 byte long byte[] with the SHA-256 of the transaction

      • deriveKey

        Applies RIPEMD160 to retrieve the CrashCoin address from a public key.
        Parameters:
        key - Public key
        Returns:
        Byte representation of the CrashCoin address

      • createKeyPairFromEncodedKeys

        public static KeyPair createKeyPairFromEncodedKeys(byte[] publicKeyBytes,
                                                   byte[] privateKeyBytes)
        Convert encoded private and public keys (bytes) to Private / PublicKey interfaces and generate a KeyPair from them in order to construct a Wallet object in the signIn method
        Two different encoding
        Parameters:
        publicKeyBytes - the public key with encoding X509
        privateKeyBytes - the private key with encoding PKCS8
        Returns:
        the key pair

        public static SecretKey computeSecretKey(char[] userPassword,
                                         byte[] salt)
        Compute an encryption / decryption key (they are the same) from the password and the salt
        Parameters:
        userPassword - password of the user
        salt - extended string
        Returns:
        SecretKey

        Transforms a byte array into a PrivateKey.
